name: FloatGoat
description:
An endless goat floater involving hyper inflated animals salt and a whole lot of hot air. Float like a balloon! Watch as you spin helplessly through the air! Try not to deflate! Summary:

ever wanted to be an inflated goat moving and spinning uncontrollably? well your prayers have been answered! endlessly float through a valley of pointy toothed enemies and high branching trees. don't forget the salt!

controls:

A-Move left 

D-Move right 

W-Rise 

S-Drop

ESC-Exit

Credit:

Jorden Dobson -Lead designer

Alexi Most -  programmer

Noah Albright - Programmer

Audrey Meyer - Character artists/animator

Elli-Aliisa Vilijamaa - Character artist

Soreiany Khong - environmental artists

Made for the Academy of Interactive Entertainment's Alphabet Jam May 2019

Theme: Elevation
